1: <pb/><t>Elokab aw xin ach Job, okto wal jila' mactxel ok tak'wok ayach. ¿Mac wal ángelal ok a k'an is colwal?</t>
2: <t>Yob is nabal mactxel chi yak' lajwok ay ba yin toc'al chi alxi, axa sawenal chi ion c'apax el is k'inal.</t>
3: <t>Ayin caw max wil eb yob is nabal, max chanaj el eb yich yaj can yin xiwil tzet yetal; palta yinc'al aymanil max jayoc catab yiban eb.</t>
4: <t>A yuninal eb, c'amxa jabok xewilal chi yila'. A bay satak eb yajaw yobxac'al chi utlay eb, tokwal ayto mac chi colon el eb.</t>
5: <t>A masanil satlak yawoj eb axac'al eb ak'om wajil chi loon aytok, caxc'al xolakxac'al q'uix chi ilay eltek, axa eb jelan yin ioj aytek satej chi iontok is beyomal eb.</t>
6: <t>A yatakilal man toc'alok chi yalnej aj ba bay sat tx'otx' ti'; a yailal manak yul tx'otx' ti' chi ajolok.</t>
7: <t>Yulc'al yet eb anima chi yitek yatakilal yiban, axca chi yun yeltek tz'it k'ak' xol junok k'ak'ej.</t>
8: <t>A tinani' ach Job, ta ayin caytu' wayji axca ach ti', chi mi wal na ba in c'ul satak Dios, chi mi wal in cawxinakil bay.</t>
9: <t>Yujtol chi yun Cham xiwil tzet yetal tol c'ayubtakxac'al yoqui, c'amxa chi bischaj tzet chi yunej.</t>
10: <t>A Cham chi aontek nab yiban tx'otx' tx'otx', axca tu' chi yun yoc yal mulnajil.</t>
11: <t>A Cham chi ion aj can eb yaynakil chi yut ba, cax chi yak'on ayjok ec' eb ayoc yin yailal yin watx'il.</t>
12: <t>A Cham chi uchontok tzet yetal chi na eb aj nabal, cax chi yak'on ayc'ayok.</t>
13: <t>A Cham chi ak'on ayc'ay eb jelan yin yob nabalej nabil yuj eb, cax chi yak'on lajwok Cham jelanil eb tu'.</t>
14: <t>Yet wal chuman c'u chi telc'oj eb axca wal tol a yet ak'balil chi ec'jab eb, toxac'al chi ec' matxatxok eb axca tol ak'balil.</t>
15: <t>A Dios chi colon el eb ok'bal c'ul yayji yul k'ab eb chi yochej chi c'ayon elok, chi yiel eb yul k'ab eb etnewom.</t>
16: <t>A wal Cham ayoc yipok c'ul eb tol c'amxa yip, xan chi tz'inji eb yobtakwom.</t>
17: <pb/><t>Watx' yet eb anima tol a Dios chi ak'on cuenta; manchak entaknej el is yak'bal cuenta Cham tol chi je' yuj masanil.</t>
18: <t>Ta a Cham chi ak'on yasjok junok mactxel, ac'ala' Cham chi anten paxok. Ta a yetok is k'ab Cham chi ak'on yab yail junok mactxel, a Cham chi ak'on watx'jok paxok.</t>
19: <t>Ok ach col-layc'al el yuj Cham yin xiwil elal bay ay is mayil, man ok cha apnok oc Cham yobtakil en.</t>
20: <t>A yul tiempoal wajil ok ach col-lay el yul k'ab camich yuj Cham, ac'ala' yul tiempoal owal ok ach col-lay el yuj bay ch'en espada.</t>
21: <t>A Cham ok ach colon el bay eb alom k'umal, man ok ach xiwok yet ok jay yatakilal.</t>
22: <t>Toc'al ok ach tzewok yuj wajil c'al yuj yatakilal, cax man ok ach xiw bay no xolakteal no'.</t>
23: <t>A bay ok oc mulnajil c'am ch'en ch'en ok ach etnenok, a no chiwajwom no', watx' ak'on yetok.</t>
24: <t>Watx'c'al ak'on bay a na, a yet ok a bison a calnel tz'akanc'al ayic' no'.</t>
25: <t>Xiwilxa ok aj can enatil axcaxac'al ch'ib an ac'un bay xolak te'.</t>
26: <t>Caw wal yinxac'al icham winakil ok yun a cami, axca chi yun jolay junok topan ixim trigo tol k'inxa.</t>
27: <t>A wal co jelanilal chon cuyoni tol axca tu' yayji, yuj tu' chi cam wal abeni c'al a beybalneni, ẍi cham Elifaz.</t>
